nodes.text: Leadership, Order, Power was a propaganda poster created for the Galactic Empire. It depicted Galactic Emperor Palpatine, in his pre-disfigured self during the Clone Wars, standing prominently below a banner featuring the Imperial crest above him with red lines and dark centers emanating from it, as well as the words "Leadership", and below it, "Order, Power" written in Aurebesh.
This poster was featured prominently on Vardos and Naboo.
